title: Ep. 45: Chinae Alexander Talks Holy Grail Skincare, Dating App Success, & Body Confidence.
itunes:title: Ep. 45: Chinae Alexander Talks Holy Grail Skincare, Dating App Success, & Body Confidence.
description:
In this episode, we are talking to one of the most inspiring people on Instagram (and one of our live show guests!), Chinae Alexander! Chinae is an influencer, a podcast host (check out Press Send!), a makeup extraordinaire, and fitness icon. We talk about a little of everything, from removing toxicity and body confidence, to her holy grail skincare products and her favorite under-the-radar makeup brands. Chinae also shares her amazing dating app success story and her stance on the pressure surrounding the passions and jobs.

Also in this episode, Grace is obsessed with @theflairindex on Instagram and Becca has finally found the perfect sleep shirt from Recliner! Make sure to buy your ticket to the live show because we are almost sold out!

You can find Chinae at @chinaealexander on Instagram and listen to her on Press Send podcast!

Sponsors:

  • Night Pillow: For 20% of through the end of March, go to discovernight.com and enter code BOP20 at checkout.
  • Lola: For 40% all subscriptions, go to mylola.com and enter code BOP at check out

Books Mentioned:

The Woman Inside

Verity – Our March Bookclub

Marriage Vacation

I am Pilgrim 

Tell Me Lies

The Seas

An Unkindness of Magicians

So Here’s the Thing

Who Thought This Was a Good Idea

 

Can't get enough Bad On Paper?

Join our FB group for amazing book recs & more

Follow us on Instagram @badonpaperpodcast
